Directions: Base your answer to the following question on the information below and on your knowledge of science.
Content: :ibox:The diagram represents a pendulum, which is a weight attached by a string to a fixed point and allowed to swing freely back and forth. A group of students did an experiment in which they timed, in seconds (s), how long it took for the pendulum to complete one swing (back and forth) for five different string lengths. The results are shown in the data table.
